information: Semantic Tree tests for badly formatted input.

Layout_Underspec_3.expected: <stree><underscore role="latinletter" id="2"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">a</identifier><punctuation role="underaccent" annotation="accent:unknown" id="1">?</punctuation></children></underscore></stree>

Layout_Underspec_7.expected: <stree><subscript role="latinletter" id="2"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">a</identifier><punctuation role="unknown" id="1">?</punctuation></children></subscript></stree>

Layout_Overspec_0.expected: <stree><overscore role="latinletter" id="3"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">a</identifier><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></overscore></stree>

Layout_Overspec_1.expected: <stree><underscore role="latinletter" id="3"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">a</identifier><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></underscore></stree>

Layout_Overspec_2.expected: <stree><overscore role="latinletter" id="5"><children><underscore role="underover" id="4"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">a</identifier><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></underscore><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="2">c</identifier></children></overscore></stree>

Layout_Overspec_3.expected: <stree><subscript role="latinletter" id="3"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">a</identifier><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></subscript></stree>

Layout_Overspec_4.expected: <stree><superscript role="latinletter" id="3"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">a</identifier><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></superscript></stree>

Layout_Overspec_5.expected: <stree><superscript role="latinletter" id="5"><children><subscript role="subsup" id="4"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">a</identifier><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></subscript><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="2">c</identifier></children></superscript></stree>

tests._comment_5: Underspecified Layout Elements with Limit functions

Limit_Underspec_3.expected: <stree><limlower role="limit function" id="2"><children><function role="limit function" font="normal" id="0">lim</function><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></limlower></stree>

Limit_Underspec_7.expected: <stree><limlower role="limit function" id="2"><children><function role="limit function" font="normal" id="0">lim</function><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></limlower></stree>

Limit_Overspec_0.expected: <stree><limupper role="limit function" id="3"><children><function role="limit function" font="normal" id="0">lim</function><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></limupper></stree>

Limit_Overspec_1.expected: <stree><limlower role="limit function" id="3"><children><function role="limit function" font="normal" id="0">lim</function><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></limlower></stree>

Limit_Overspec_2.expected: <stree><limboth role="limit function" id="4"><children><function role="limit function" font="normal" id="0">lim</function><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="2">c</identifier></children></limboth></stree>

Limit_Overspec_3.expected: <stree><limlower role="limit function" id="3"><children><function role="limit function" font="normal" id="0">lim</function><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></limlower></stree>

Limit_Overspec_4.expected: <stree><limupper role="limit function" id="3"><children><function role="limit function" font="normal" id="0">lim</function><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></limupper></stree>

Limit_Overspec_5.expected: <stree><limboth role="limit function" id="4"><children><function role="limit function" font="normal" id="0">lim</function><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="2">c</identifier></children></limboth></stree>

Bigop_Underspec_3.expected: <stree><limlower role="sum" id="2"><children><largeop role="sum" id="0">∑</largeop><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></limlower></stree>

Bigop_Underspec_7.expected: <stree><limlower role="sum" id="2"><children><largeop role="sum" id="0">∑</largeop><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></limlower></stree>

Integral_Underspec_3.expected: <stree><limlower role="integral" id="2"><children><largeop role="integral" id="0">∫</largeop><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></limlower></stree>

Integral_Underspec_7.expected: <stree><limlower role="integral" id="2"><children><largeop role="integral" id="0">∫</largeop><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></limlower></stree>

Fraction_Underspec.expected: <stree><fraction role="division" id="2"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">a</identifier><empty role="unknown" id="1"/></children></fraction></stree>

Fraction_Overspec.expected: <stree><fraction role="division" id="2"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">a</identifier><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">b</identifier></children></fraction></stree>

Root_Overspec.expected: <stree><root role="unknown" id="2"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">b</identifier><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">a</identifier></children></root></stree>

tests._comment_14: Empty display expressions that could lead to enrichment issues.

Sqrt_Display_1.expected: <stree><infixop role="implicit" annotation="clearspeak:unit" id="4">⁢<content><operator role="multiplication" id="3">⁢</operator></content><children><sqrt role="unknown" id="1"><children><empty role="unknown" id="0"/></children></sqrt><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="2">a</identifier></children></infixop></stree>

Sqrt_Display_2.expected: <stree><infixop role="addition" id="7">+<content><operator role="addition" id="3">+</operator></content><children><infixop role="implicit" annotation="clearspeak:unit" id="6">⁢<content><operator role="multiplication" id="5">⁢</operator></content><children><sqrt role="unknown" id="1"><children><empty role="unknown" id="0"/></children></sqrt><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="2">a</identifier></children></infixop><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="4">b</identifier></children></infixop></stree>

Root_Display_2.expected: <stree><infixop role="implicit" annotation="clearspeak:unit" id="4">⁢<content><operator role="multiplication" id="3">⁢</operator></content><children><sqrt role="unknown" id="1"><children><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="0">a</identifier></children></sqrt><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="2">b</identifier></children></infixop></stree>

Orphaned_Glyph_1.expected: <stree><infixop role="implicit" annotation="clearspeak:unit" id="3">⁢<content><operator role="multiplication" id="2">⁢</operator></content><children><unknown role="mglyph" id="0" ext-speech="some glyph"/><identifier role="latinletter" font="italic" annotation="clearspeak:simple" id="1">a</identifier></children></infixop></stree>
